<h2>#21 - Shuffle an Array</h2> <blockquote><p>2016-01-21 by <a href="https://github.com/0xmtn/">@0xmtn</a></p></blockquote> <p> This snippet here uses <a href="https://www.wikiwand.com/en/Fisher%E2%80%93Yates_shuffle">Fisher-Yates Shuffling</a> Algorithm to shuffle a given array.</p> <p><code>javascript function shuffle(arr) { var i, j, temp; for (i = arr.length - 1; i &gt; 0; i--) { j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1)); temp = arr[i]; arr[i] = arr[j]; arr[j] = temp; } return arr; }; </code> An example:</p> <p><code>javascript var a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8]; var b = shuffle(a); console.log(b); // [2, 7, 8, 6, 5, 3, 1, 4] </code></p>
